data.title: Tusculum fanø

With a total length of just 28 km, easily traversable by bike, the island is known for its charm, authenticity, and relaxing atmosphere. … The area Read More »
data.text:
Fanø encompasses all the best of life on an island. With a total length of just 28 km, easily traversable by bike, the island is known for its charm, authenticity, and relaxing atmosphere. It’s easy to fall in love with beautiful Fanø, with its long, stunning 15 km sandy beach, the sight of seals, picturesque dunes, and many authentic experiences.

Fanø offers countless experiences year-round. Dive into the unique nature at the nature playground and be enchanted by the charm of the villages Nordby and Sønderho. Visit museums or immerse yourself in artistic experiences at the galleries or indulge your taste buds with gourmet delights.

Here are some delightful places to explore, such as Pandekagehuset, Bryghuset, Realen, etc., where music flows during the peak season. Additionally, experience Fanø Vesterland, the island’s annual recurring festival – also referred to as Mini Smukfest – just a few of the many events that give Fanø its unique spirit.

Fanø allows you to shift into a completely different gear. Let stress and everyday worries stay on the mainland. Already during the ferry ride, you’ll begin to feel your body relaxing.

Fanø’s nature invites exploration. Enjoy a walk on the kilometer-long sandy beach, join an oyster safari, participate in a kite festival, or rent a moped and explore the island at your own pace. Fanø is filled with countless opportunities for those who enjoy experiencing.

But if your body and mind need to recharge, you don’t have to do anything at all – just relax and enjoy the surroundings on beautiful Fanø.

Fanø attracts golf enthusiasts in a big way. The island is home to Denmark’s oldest links golf course, offering challenging terrain and fantastic views. Golfers of all levels can enjoy the clubhouse, participate in tournaments, and experience the joy of golf year-round.

Golf has become a popular sport among Danes, and Fanø Vesterhavsbad Golf Club is known to be one of the most challenging courses in the country. When you visit Villa Tusculum, we’ve made it easy for you to bring your golf equipment. Store it conveniently, securely, and safely in a dedicated room created just for that.
